dt: {bc}not requiring touching or interaction between people

dt.t: … many retailers and restaurants have rolled out home delivery along with {wi}contactless{/wi} options, leaving food orders and grocery deliveries on door steps.

dt: {bc}relating to or being a technological system (as for making payments) where information is transmitted over short distances (as by {d_link|near field communication|near field communication}) without physical contact

dt.t: … hold your phone in front of the {wi}contactless{/wi} payment scanner to authorize the purchase.
{wi}Contactless{/wi} payment cards are not in wide circulation. Instead, consumers are increasingly making electronic payments with their cellular phones …

shortdef: not requiring touching or interaction between people
relating to or being a technological system (as for making payments) where information is transmitted over short distances (as by near field communication) without physical contact
